verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Ye shall be <S%H1961><s%> holy: <S%H6918><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> am holy. <S%H6918><s%>

Ye shall fear <S%H3372><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his mother, <S%H517><s%> and his father, <S%H1><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> my sabbaths: <S%H7676><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

Turn <S%H6437><s%> ye not <S%H408><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> idols, <S%H457><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> to yourselves molten <S%H4541><s%> gods: <S%H430><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
And if <S%H3588><s%> ye offer <S%H2076><s%> a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> ye shall offer <S%H2076><s%> it at your own will. <S%H7522><s%>

It shall be eaten <S%H398><s%> the same day <S%H3117><s%> ye offer <S%H2077><s%> it, and on the morrow: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4283><s%> and if aught remain <S%H3498><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> it shall be burnt <S%H8313><s%> in the fire. <S%H784><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> it be eaten at all <S%H398><s%> <S%H398><s%> on the third <S%H7992><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is abominable; <S%H6292><s%> it shall not <S%H3808><s%> be accepted. <S%H7521><s%>

Therefore every one that eateth <S%H398><s%> it shall bear <S%H5375><s%> his iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he hath profaned <S%H2490><s%> <S%H853><s%> the hallowed thing <S%H6944><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and that <S%H1931><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from among his people. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5971><s%>

And when ye reap <S%H7114><s%> <S%H853><s%> the harvest <S%H7105><s%> of your land, <S%H776><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> wholly reap <S%H3615><s%> <S%H7114><s%> the corners <S%H6285><s%> of thy field, <S%H7704><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou gather <S%H3950><s%> the gleanings <S%H3951><s%> of thy harvest. <S%H7105><s%>

And thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> glean <S%H5953><s%> thy vineyard, <S%H3754><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou gather <S%H3950><s%> every grape <S%H6528><s%> of thy vineyard; <S%H3754><s%> thou shalt leave <S%H5800><s%> them for the poor <S%H6041><s%> and stranger: <S%H1616><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
Ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> steal, <S%H1589><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> deal falsely, <S%H3584><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> lie <S%H8266><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another. <S%H5997><s%>

And ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> swear <S%H7650><s%> by my name <S%H8034><s%> falsely, <S%H8267><s%> neither shalt thou profane <S%H2490><s%> <S%H853><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of thy God: <S%H430><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> defraud <S%H6231><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> rob <S%H1497><s%> him: the wages <S%H6468><s%> of him that is hired <S%H7916><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> abide with thee all night <S%H3885><s%> <S%H854><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the morning. <S%H1242><s%>

Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> curse <S%H7043><s%> the deaf, <S%H2795><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> a stumblingblock <S%H4383><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the blind, <S%H5787><s%> but shalt fear thy God: <S%H3372><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H430><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> unrighteousness <S%H5766><s%> in judgment: <S%H4941><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> respect <S%H5375><s%> the person <S%H6440><s%> of the poor, <S%H1800><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> honor <S%H1921><s%> the person <S%H6440><s%> of the mighty: <S%H1419><s%> but in righteousness <S%H6664><s%> shalt thou judge <S%H8199><s%> thy neighbor. <S%H5997><s%>

Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> go up and down <S%H1980><s%> as a talebearer <S%H7400><s%> among thy people: <S%H5971><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou stand <S%H5975><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of thy neighbor: <S%H7453><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> hate <S%H8130><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy brother <S%H251><s%> in thine heart: <S%H3824><s%> thou shalt in any wise rebuke <S%H3198><s%> <S%H3198><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy neighbor, <S%H5997><s%> and not <S%H3808><s%> suffer <S%H5375><s%> sin <S%H2399><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> him.

Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> avenge, <S%H5358><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> bear any grudge <S%H5201><s%> against <S%H853><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of thy people, <S%H5971><s%> but thou shalt love <S%H157><s%> thy neighbor <S%H7453><s%> as thyself: <S%H3644><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Ye shall keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> my statutes. <S%H2708><s%> Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> let thy cattle <S%H929><s%> engender <S%H7250><s%> with a diverse kind: <S%H3610><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> sow <S%H2232><s%> thy field <S%H7704><s%> with mingled seed: <S%H3610><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall a garment <S%H899><s%> mingled <S%H3610><s%> of linen and woolen <S%H8162><s%> come <S%H5927><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee.

And whosoever <S%H376><s%> <S%H3588><s%> lieth <S%H7901><s%> carnally <S%H7902><s%> <S%H2233><s%> with <S%H854><s%> a woman, <S%H802><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> is a bondmaid, <S%H8198><s%> betrothed <S%H2778><s%> to a husband, <S%H376><s%> and not <S%H3808><s%> at all redeemed, <S%H6299><s%> <S%H6299><s%> nor <S%H176><s%> <S%H3808><s%> freedom <S%H2668><s%> given <S%H5414><s%> her; she shall be <S%H1961><s%> scourged; <S%H1244><s%> they shall not <S%H3808><s%> be put to death, <S%H4191><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> she was not free. <S%H2666><s%> <S%H3808><s%>

And he shall bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> his trespass offering <S%H817><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> even a ram <S%H352><s%> for a trespass offering. <S%H817><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> him with the ram <S%H352><s%> of the trespass offering <S%H817><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> his sin <S%H2403><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he hath done: <S%H2398><s%> and the sin <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2403><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he hath done <S%H2398><s%> shall be forgiven <S%H5545><s%> him.

And when <S%H3588><s%> ye shall come <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> and shall have planted <S%H5193><s%> all manner <S%H3605><s%> of trees <S%H6086><s%> for food, <S%H3978><s%> then ye shall count <S%H6188><s%> <S%H853><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> thereof as uncircumcised: <S%H6189><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> shall it be <S%H1961><s%> as uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> unto you: it shall not <S%H3808><s%> be eaten <S%H398><s%> of.
But in the fourth <S%H7243><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> thereof shall be <S%H1961><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> to praise <S%H1974><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> withal.

And in the fifth <S%H2549><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> shall ye eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H853><s%> of the fruit <S%H6529><s%> thereof, that it may yield <S%H3254><s%> unto you the increase <S%H8393><s%> thereof: I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

Ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> any thing with <S%H5921><s%> the blood: <S%H1818><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall ye use enchantment, <S%H5172><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> observe times. <S%H6049><s%>

Ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> round <S%H5362><s%> the corners <S%H6285><s%> of your heads, <S%H7218><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou mar <S%H7843><s%> <S%H853><s%> the corners <S%H6285><s%> of thy beard. <S%H2206><s%>

Ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> make <S%H5414><s%> any cuttings <S%H8296><s%> in your flesh <S%H1320><s%> for the dead, <S%H5315><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> print <S%H5414><s%> any marks <S%H3793><s%> <S%H7085><s%> upon you: I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Do not <S%H408><s%> prostitute <S%H2490><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy daughter, <S%H1323><s%> to cause her to be a whore; <S%H2181><s%> lest <S%H3808><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> fall to whoredom, <S%H2181><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> become full <S%H4390><s%> of wickedness. <S%H2154><s%>
Ye shall keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> my sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> and reverence <S%H3372><s%> my sanctuary: <S%H4720><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Regard <S%H6437><s%> not <S%H408><s%> them that have familiar spirits, <S%H178><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> seek <S%H1245><s%> after <S%H413><s%> wizards, <S%H3049><s%> to be defiled <S%H2930><s%> by them: I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

Thou shalt rise up <S%H6965><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the hoary head, <S%H7872><s%> and honor <S%H1921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the old man, <S%H2205><s%> and fear thy God: <S%H3372><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H430><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
And if <S%H3588><s%> a stranger <S%H1616><s%> sojourn <S%H1481><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee in your land, <S%H776><s%> ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> vex <S%H3238><s%> him.

But the stranger <S%H1616><s%> that dwelleth <S%H1481><s%> with <S%H854><s%> you shall be <S%H1961><s%> unto you as one born among <S%H249><s%> <S%H4480><s%> you, and thou shalt love <S%H157><s%> him as thyself; <S%H3644><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> ye were <S%H1961><s%> strangers <S%H1616><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
Ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> unrighteousness <S%H5766><s%> in judgment, <S%H4941><s%> in meteyard, <S%H4060><s%> in weight, <S%H4948><s%> or in measure. <S%H4884><s%>

Just <S%H6664><s%> balances, <S%H3976><s%> just <S%H6664><s%> weights, <S%H68><s%> a just <S%H6664><s%> ephah, <S%H374><s%> and a just <S%H6664><s%> hin, <S%H1969><s%> shall ye have: <S%H1961><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> brought you out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

Therefore shall ye observe <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them: I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
